titles.title: To provide an increased allocation of funding under certain programs for assistance in persistent poverty counties, and for other purposes.
An Act Targeting Resources to Communities in Need

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure, and in addition to the Committees on the Judiciary, Energy and Commerce, Education and Labor, Science, Space, and Technology, Agriculture, Foreign Affairs, Financial Services, and Natural Resources, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
